Description

Contains code related to Checkstyle Ant Task.

Contains the core API to be used to implement checks.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static AuditListener
    Main.createListener(Main.OutputFormat format, Path outputLocation)
    This method creates in AuditListener an open stream for validation data, it must be closed by RootModule (default implementation is Checker) by calling auditFinished(AuditEvent).
    AuditListener
    Main.OutputFormat.createListener(OutputStream out, AbstractAutomaticBean.OutputStreamOptions options)
    Returns a new AuditListener for this OutputFormat.
